![Disclosure](https://www.weslacotx.gov/Document%20Center/Government/Open%20government/Disclosure%20statements/Disclosure.png?t=202104291732380)
The Procurement and Contract Management Division is responsible for the compliance and facilitation of all the City’s procurement processes. Our goal is to promote good financial stewardship by ensuring that the best value and quality of products and services are procured by the City for its citizens and community.
As community leaders, citizens can provide an invaluable service to the City through board or committee membership and participation. Members volunteer many hours annually, by sharing their time and expertise, while learning more about the City through their membership.
Our community can use My Weslaco App or use our website to submit request.
Access information about meeting agendas and minutes for various boards, commissions, and committees.
**[City Ordinances:](https://library.municode.com/tx/weslaco/codes/code_of_ordinances)**
Search for city's ordinances.
